resources.string: Select the answer from the options given. Once you answer a question you can\'t change your answer. Once you have answered all the questions, you will go to a page that tells you your score.\n\nYou can return to the title screen using the up or back from within the game screen, and this will also end your game.
The Rick and Morty quiz will help remind you of important concepts you have learned by watching Rick and Morty.\n\nConsider modifying the questions to make this game your own!
